Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the poster is not authentic and the claims made about Covid-19 vaccination are false.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the risks and dangers of Covid-19 vaccination by stating that there are more dangers than benefits.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or data to back up the statement that vaccines do not prevent the spread of Covid-19.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that new gene therapy methods used in Covid-19 vaccines are not safe, without providing any evidence or scientific basis for this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations for the creation and dissemination of the misleading poster, such as misinformation or anti-vaccine propaganda.
